Total Cost of Revenue: product delivery and transaction related expenses

Income Before Taxes: income loss from continuing operations before income taxes extraordinary items noncontrolling interest
Net Income: net income loss available to common stockholders basic

Interest Income: interest and dividend income operating abstract
interest and fee income loans and leases
interest income debt securities trading operating
interest income federal funds sold and securities purchased under agreements to resell
Other Income (Expense): available for sale debt securities realized gain loss other than temporary impairments amount
marketable securities realized gain loss excluding other than temporary impairments
net impairment losses on available for sale debt securities

Other Comprehensive Income: non credit portion of other than temporary impairments of debt reclassification recognized in other comprehensive income

Weighted Average Shares Outstanding (Bas: weighted average number of shares outstanding basic
Weighted Average Shares Outstanding (Dil: weighted average number of diluted shares outstanding

__unmapped__: common stock dividends per share cash paid
financing receivable excluding accrued interest and off balance sheet liability credit loss provision reversal
preferred stock dividends and other adjustments
preferred stock dividends income statement impact
income loss from continuing operations before income taxes minority interest and income loss from equity method investments
